ca.team3161.lib.utils.controls

Class LogitechDualAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.team3161.lib.utils.controls.LogitechDualAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Gamepad

    public class LogitechDualAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Gamepad
    A Gamepad implementation describing the Logitech DualAction gamepad
